001package reciprocal.linear.vector;
002
003import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkArgument;
004import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
005
006import java.io.Serial;
007import java.math.BigDecimal;
008import java.math.MathContext;
009import java.util.List;
010import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
011
012/**
013 * Immutable implementation of a vector that uses {@link BigDecimal} as type for its elements
014 *
015 * @since 0.0.1
016 */
017public final class BigDecimalVector
018    extends AbstractMathContextVector<@NotNull BigDecimal, @NotNull BigDecimalVector, @NotNull BigDecimal> {
019    @Serial
020    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
021
022    BigDecimalVector(final int size, final @NotNull List<@NotNull VectorEntry<@NotNull BigDecimal>> entries) {
023        super(size, entries);
024    }
025
026    /**
027     * Returns {@link BigDecimalVectorBuilder}
028     *
029     * @param size size
030     * @return {@link BigDecimalVectorBuilder}
031     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when {@code size < 1}
032     * @since 0.0.1
033     */
034    public static BigDecimalVectorBuilder ofSize(final int size) {
035        return new BigDecimalVectorBuilder(size);
036    }
037
038    @Override
039    public @NotNull BigDecimalVector add(final @NotNull BigDecimalVector summand) {
040        requireNonNull(summand, "summand");
041        checkArgument(getSize() == summand.getSize(), "equal sizes expected but %s != %s", getSize(),
042            summand.getSize());
043        return new BigDecimalVector(getSize(),
044            getEntries().map(e -> e.withElement(e.element().add(summand.getElement(e.index())))).toList());
045    }
046
047    @Override
048    public @NotNull BigDecimalVector add(final @NotNull BigDecimalVector summand,
049        final @NotNull MathContext mathContext) {
050        requireNonNull(summand, "summand");
051        checkArgument(getSize() == summand.getSize(), "equal sizes expected but %s != %s", getSize(),
052            summand.getSize());
053        requireNonNull(mathContext, "mathContext");
054        return new BigDecimalVector(getSize(),
055            getEntries().map(e -> e.withElement(e.element().add(summand.getElement(e.index()), mathContext)))
056                .toList());
057    }
058
059    @Override
060    public @NotNull BigDecimalVector subtract(final @NotNull BigDecimalVector subtrahend) {
061        requireNonNull(subtrahend, "subtrahend");
062        checkArgument(getSize() == subtrahend.getSize(), "equal sizes expected but %s != %s", getSize(),
063            subtrahend.getSize());
064        return new BigDecimalVector(getSize(),
065            getEntries().map(e -> e.withElement(e.element().subtract(subtrahend.getElement(e.index()))))
066                .toList());
067    }
068
069    @Override
070    public @NotNull BigDecimalVector subtract(
071        final @NotNull BigDecimalVector subtrahend,
072        final @NotNull MathContext mathContext
073    ) {
074        requireNonNull(subtrahend, "subtrahend");
075        checkArgument(getSize() == subtrahend.getSize(), "equal sizes expected but %s != %s", getSize(),
076            subtrahend.getSize());
077        requireNonNull(mathContext, "mathContext");
078        return new BigDecimalVector(getSize(),
079            getEntries()
080                .map(e -> e.withElement(e.element().subtract(subtrahend.getElement(e.index()), mathContext)))
081                .toList());
082    }
083
084    @Override
085    public @NotNull BigDecimal dotProduct(final @NotNull BigDecimalVector other) {
086        requireNonNull(other, "other");
087        checkArgument(getSize() == other.getSize(), "equal sizes expected but %s != %s", getSize(), other.getSize());
088        return getEntries().map(e -> e.element().multiply(other.getElement(e.index()))).reduce(BigDecimal::add)
089            .orElseThrow();
090    }
091
092    @Override
093    public @NotNull BigDecimal dotProduct(final @NotNull BigDecimalVector other,
094        final @NotNull MathContext mathContext) {
095        requireNonNull(other, "other");
096        checkArgument(getSize() == other.getSize(), "equal sizes expected but %s != %s", getSize(), other.getSize());
097        requireNonNull(mathContext, "mathContext");
098        return getEntries().map(e -> e.element().multiply(other.getElement(e.index()), mathContext))
099            .reduce((a, b) -> a.add(b, mathContext))
100            .orElseThrow();
101    }
102
103    @Override
104    public @NotNull BigDecimalVector scalarMultiply(final @NotNull BigDecimal scalar) {
105        requireNonNull(scalar, "scalar");
106        return new BigDecimalVector(getSize(),
107            getEntries().map(e -> e.withElement(scalar.multiply(e.element()))).toList());
108    }
109
110    @Override
111    public @NotNull BigDecimalVector scalarMultiply(final @NotNull BigDecimal scalar,
112        final @NotNull MathContext mathContext) {
113        requireNonNull(scalar, "scalar");
114        requireNonNull(mathContext, "mathContext");
115        return new BigDecimalVector(getSize(),
116            getEntries().map(e -> e.withElement(scalar.multiply(e.element(), mathContext))).toList());
117    }
118
119    @Override
120    public @NotNull BigDecimalVector negate() {
121        return new BigDecimalVector(getSize(),
122            getEntries().map(e -> e.withElement(e.element().negate())).toList());
123    }
124
125    @Override
126    public @NotNull BigDecimalVector negate(final @NotNull MathContext mathContext) {
127        requireNonNull(mathContext, "mathContext");
128        return new BigDecimalVector(getSize(),
129            getEntries().map(e -> e.withElement(e.element().negate(mathContext))).toList());
130    }
131
132    @Override
133    public boolean orthogonalTo(final @NotNull BigDecimalVector other) {
134        requireNonNull(other, "other");
135        checkArgument(getSize() == other.getSize(), "equal sizes expected but %s != %s", getSize(), other.getSize());
136        return dotProduct(other).compareTo(BigDecimal.ZERO) == 0;
137    }
138
139    @Override
140    public boolean orthogonalTo(final @NotNull BigDecimalVector other, final @NotNull MathContext mathContext) {
141        requireNonNull(other, "other");
142        checkArgument(getSize() == other.getSize(), "equal sizes expected but %s != %s", getSize(), other.getSize());
143        requireNonNull(mathContext, "mathContext");
144        return dotProduct(other, mathContext).compareTo(BigDecimal.ZERO) == 0;
145    }
146
147    @Override
148    public @NotNull BigDecimal taxicabNorm() {
149        return getElements().map(BigDecimal::abs).reduce(BigDecimal::add).orElseThrow();
150    }
151
152    @Override
153    public @NotNull BigDecimal taxicabNorm(final @NotNull MathContext mathContext) {
154        requireNonNull(mathContext, "mathContext");
155        return getElements().map(a -> a.abs(mathContext)).reduce((a, b) -> a.add(b, mathContext))
156            .orElseThrow();
157    }
158
159    @Override
160    public @NotNull BigDecimal euclideanNorm() {
161        return euclideanNormPow2().sqrt(MathContext.UNLIMITED);
162    }
163
164    @Override
165    public @NotNull BigDecimal euclideanNorm(final @NotNull MathContext mathContext) {
166        requireNonNull(mathContext, "mathContext");
167        return euclideanNormPow2(mathContext).sqrt(mathContext);
168    }
169
170    @Override
171    public @NotNull BigDecimal maxNorm() {
172        return getElements().map(BigDecimal::abs).max(BigDecimal::compareTo).orElseThrow();
173    }
174
175    @Override
176    public @NotNull BigDecimal maxNorm(final @NotNull MathContext mathContext) {
177        requireNonNull(mathContext, "mathContext");
178        return getElements().map(a -> a.abs(mathContext)).max(BigDecimal::compareTo).orElseThrow();
179    }
180
181    @Override
182    protected @NotNull BigDecimal euclideanNormPow2() {
183        return getElements().map(e -> e.multiply(e)).reduce(BigDecimal::add).orElseThrow();
184    }
185
186    @Override
187    protected @NotNull BigDecimal euclideanNormPow2(final @NotNull MathContext mathContext) {
188        requireNonNull(mathContext, "mathContext");
189        return getElements().map(e -> e.multiply(e, mathContext)).reduce((a, b) -> a.add(b, mathContext))
190            .orElseThrow();
191    }
192
193    /**
194     * Builder for {@link BigDecimalVector BigDecimalVectors}
195     *
196     * @since 0.0.1
197     */
198    public static final class BigDecimalVectorBuilder extends
199        AbstractVectorBuilder<@NotNull BigDecimal, @NotNull BigDecimalVector, @NotNull BigDecimalVectorBuilder> {
200        BigDecimalVectorBuilder(final int size) {
201            super(size, i -> BigDecimal.ZERO);
202        }
203
204        @Override
205        public @NotNull BigDecimalVector build() {
206            return new BigDecimalVector(getSize(), computeEntries());
207        }
208    }
209}
